scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts an interior domestic setting with several figures engaged in various activities. On the left, a woman in a blue dress and white head covering tends to a large pot over a fire within an open hearth. Two men stand in the center; one, wearing a red hat and blue tunic with pink hose, carries a jug and gestures towards a table laden with food. The other man, in a gold robe and black hat, holds a white cloth. To the right, two women are seated at the table, one in a pink and black gown, the other in a black dress. The woman on the far right is drinking from a bowl. A white dog lies on the floor beneath the table. The room features a tiled floor and windows with diamond-shaped panes.
